DOC.brief_summary: Phase I , randomise , open label , 3-period crossover study healthy male subject investigate effect food pharmacokinetics AZD8931 investigate safety tolerability AZD8931 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Effect Food Pharmacokinetics Oral AZD8931 Tablets
DOC.criteria: Provision write informed consent Body mass index ( BMI ) 19 30 kg/m2 Use prescribe nonprescribed medication ( include analgesic , herbal remedy , vitamin mineral ) two week prior first administration investigational product Administration another investigational medicinal product 3 month start dose study Definite suspect clinically relevant personal history adverse drug reaction , drug hypersensitivity
